::Composer::

Composer paced back and forth, awaiting the mission.  He went=
 over to Vamprah.

"Hey," he said, "We're gonna stump those Maximals.  I've=
 had experience in this kind of stuff, and its thanks to one of the bots in=
 my army, my brother Orchestra.  Ah, I remember the days as a leader......B=
ut now, I'm solo.  However, I'm with you, and quite pleased to be."

He smi=
led to Vamprah, then looked to Wheeljack.

"Any response?" Composer asked.
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October 21, 2001 11:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Allia=
nce Role Call (All members respond!)


  :::Wheeljack::: 

  Wheeljack: As =
you know, the Maximals have a new base, a city.  This project was started a=
while ago by Zardus, and is very similar to the mission that the late Felin=
e and Skulletron undertook when the Maximals had just settled into the Cybe=
rtronian Fire.  But this time i have equipped Vamprah and Composer with dev=
ices that mask energy signatures, fooling the Maximals into thinking they a=
re one of them.  Vamprah has even been given a temporary new body design fo=
r this mission.  We were ready to go, but there is a battle going on a Maxi=
mal City right now.  We need your approval as to if we should go anyway or =
not. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT
          =
   
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! T=
erms of Service.
